item.description:
Let's meet at Jam'n Java, 594 Massachusetts Avenue and walk through the historical district of Arlington. There's plenty of parking across the street in a large parking lot on Mystic Ave or on Mass Ave.

The more notable stop will be at Robbins Farm where you can look out over Arlington and Cambridge to see the Boston skyline. In the summer, this spot is used for star gazing and seeing fireworks and in the winter, it becomes a hot spot for sledding.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet outside Jam N' Java
item.name: Exploring Arlington Walk
